directors.name: Nikita Marks
directors.description: “It always amazes me how much talent there is in every corner of the globe.”

directors.name: Cristian Duncan
directors.description: “Distributed teams required unique processes. You need to approach work in a new way.”

directors.name: Cruz Hamer
directors.description: “Technology is at the forefront of enabling distributed teams. That's where we come in.”

directors.name: Drake Heaton
directors.description: “Hiring similar people from similar backgrounds is a surefire way to stunt innovation.”

directors.name: Griffin Wise
directors.description: “Unique perspectives shape unique products, which is what you need to survive these days.”

directors.name: Aden Allan
directors.description: “Empowered teams create truly amazing products. Set the north star and let them follow it.”
